content: make your own crochet angel my crochet angel is crocheted in medium weight yarn beginning at the top her head and worked in continuous rounds to the base of her skirt this angel stands on her own and she does not need to be stiffened you can easily add a ribbon to her back just above her wings to transform her into a christmas tree ornament or stitch her hands together to make her pray elevate your holiday decor with the charming angel christmas ornament crochet pattern this delightful project is perfect for adding a touch of handmade warmth to your tree or gifting to loved ones the pattern includes detailed photo tutorials and written instructions making it suitable for crocheters of all skill levels **unique features-** easy level pattern suitable for beginners detailed photo tutorial and written instructions included versatile customization options for size perfect for holiday gifting and decorating **materials needed-** yarn red heart super saver solids -
